message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
You were generous, now it's my turn to be bold
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest solution.
Your 50/50 idea inspired me, but I think I deserve a bit more
This is my final offer. Let's be realistic -  accept this and we both walk away with something decent.
You said that was your final offer, but I think you can do better
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My previous offer was more than fair.  I'm returning to it one last time - take it or leave it.
